resources.string: Oops! Camera app is not available or failed.
This is likely because the camera app is disabled. You can enable it in the settings or install another camera app.
Oops! We couldn\'t read the text from your image.

This might happen if the image quality isn't good enough or if there was an issue processing it.
 Try these steps to fix it:

 1. Restart the app and try again.
 2. Make sure the text in the image is clear, well-lit, and easy to read.
 3. Capture a new image and repeat the process.
 If the problem persists, feel free to contact support for help!

We "couldn't" save your receipt and its data to your "phone's" storage.
 This could be due to one of the following reasons:
 - Your phone may be out of storage space
 - There may be an unexpected issue with the storage system.

 Try these steps to fix the issue:
 1. Check your "phone's" storage and free up space if needed.
 2. Restart the app and try saving again.
 3. If the problem persists, restart your phone

 If none of these steps worked, feel free to contact support for help
Oops! This app might not work here
This app needs a bit more power to run smoothly.\nThe app requires at least 2GB of RAM to be able to function.
